note.p: Education: Merchant Taylors' School; St John's College, Oxford; BA (1670), MA (1673)
Career: Chaplain to George, Earl of Berkeley (FRS 1663); Rector of Seagrave, Leicestershire (1682-1715); Archdeacon of Leicester (1703)
Authority: Birth and death date from V Sillery, St John's College, Oxford
Notes: Proposed by William Holder. Never in lists according to Hunter.
